thread.title: Timothy R Mickel
thread.title_full: Eagle Optics reviewed by Timothy R Mickel

author: Timothy R Mickel
title: Timothy R Mickel
text:
This event was a purchase for my wife's birthday. Adrian did an excellent job as salesman and demonstrator of equipment. He took his time, showed her a range of equipment and let her take time to decide what she wanted. At the end he assembled the equipment so that it was ready to go.
There was a birthday party going in the background which was somewhat distracting. Should have been moved to another room.
